smart_goals.description: By the next visit, maintain a diet of 1,500 calories or less per day to help manage diabetes.
In the next week, monitor blood sugar levels four times a day to identify patterns and adjust medication as needed.
Increase physical activity to 30 minutes of moderate exercise most days of the week within the next month to improve overall health.
By the next visit, learn and apply stress management techniques to reduce stress and improve mental health.
By the end of the month, quit smoking to improve overall health and reduce the risk of complications from diabetes.
